summary: There's just something not quite right when Bette Davis stars as an English nanny. And is her 10-year-old charge an emotionally disturbed murderer or just an insolent brat?
cast: Bette Davis|Wendy Craig|Jill Bennett|James Villiers|William Dix|Pamela Franklin|Jack Watling|Maurice Denham|Alfred Burke|Harry Fowler|Angharad Aubrey|Nora Gordon|Sandra Power|Jimmy Charters|Gary Graham
keywords: london england|nanny|drowning|woman dies from abortion|dead woman with eyes open
title: A merced del odio
